thread.title: Crystal London
thread.title_full: Elevate Styles reviewed by Crystal London

author: Crystal London
title: Crystal London
text: I placed my order at almost midnight on the February 21st, and it was shipped the very next day. It arrived on the 25th even though it wasn't scheduled for delivery until March 1st. I was very pleased with the entire process, and hair I received was just as advertised. I'll definitely be a repeat customer.
